notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Ebirimu byo bijja kwekweka mu nnaku 7 olw'okulondoola
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Ebirimu byo byonna mu bulungibwansi buno bijja kwekweka ne biterekebwa mu nnaku 7, oluvannyuma lw'ebyo tojja kuba na buyinza kubiggyawo oba okubikyusa. Laba ebirimu byo wammanga.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Ebirimu byo byonna mu kibiina kino bijja kwekweka ne biterekebwa mu nnaku 7, oluvannyuma lw'ebyo tojja kuba na buyinza kubiggyawo oba okubikyusa. Laba ebirimu byo wammanga.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Koona ku lujjudde lw'obulungibwansi wammanga, yingira nga omumyuka wa admini era olonde Okuddukanya obufere mu menyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Ennamba y'emirimu egishoboka okuba obufere n'ekisuubizo eky'obufere bwa 75%
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sisitimu yaffe ey'okuzimba efunye emirimu egishoboka okuba obufere. Osobola okulaba ennyo okuyitira mu mukutu gwa admini w'obulungibwansi. Emirimu egyo gy'obufere gishoboka okuba nga giralina ensonga endala ezitali bubi, kale weegendereze okunoonyereza obulungi nga tonnaggyawo birimu.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Ebirimu bino byakwatiddwa ng'ebikyamu nga bikozesa AI algorithms ezisalirawo obukyamu bw'ebirimu. Osobola okugyawo ebirimu bino singa kiba kyetaagisa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Algorithm ya AI yakwatidde ddala ebifaananyi ebikwatagana n'ebirimu bino. Algorithm eno ekola ku bifaananyi okulaba oba birimu ebikwata ku bukulu, obukambwe, eby'obulamu, n'ebirala ebisanyusa. Osobola okugyawo ebirimu bino singa kiba kyetaagisa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Olumu olw'ekikugu ky'AI lwe lukola obubonero obutuufu, mu mbeera eyo tosooka kweraliikirira, tokyalina ky'okola era osobola okuleka obubaka buno.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Ebigambo bya Lungereza ebyakozesebwa okufuna obubonero
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Ensonga empya egiyongeddwako ku kino kya wano
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Ensonga empya egiyongeddwako ku kyaalo kyo
email.user_invite_2: Kola ku ssuula oba osse mu kisasi ky'omukutu gw'omusasi okukkiriza okuyitibwa
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Ensonga egambibwa nti si nungi ku lulowooza lwange
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Ensonga egambibwa nti nungi ku lulowooza lwange
email.reset_password_1: Wano waliwo olukalala okukyusa ekigambo ky'ekyama kyo.
email.reset_password_2: Bw'oba tosabye kino, nyiikira email eno.
email.reset_password_3: Ekigambo ky'ekyama kyo tekijja kukyuka okutuusa lw'onoonya olukalala oluli waggulu n'okola ekiggya.
